release.description: This release of the Keyword Search is a component of the integrated release 9.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of Keyword Search is a component of the integrated release 9.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Initial release of the Keyword Search interface that queries the Search Service for Product_Bundle, Product_Collection and Product_Observational products and displays the results to the user.
